other_title: A Corpse is Buried Under Sakurako's Feet.
Sakurako-san no Ashimoto ni wa Shitai ga Umatteiru (Japanese)
櫻子さんの足下には死体が埋まっている (Japanese)
plot: Shōtarō Tatewaki is a normal high school student with a serious demeanor hangs around with Sakurako Kujō. Sakurako is an extraordinarily beautiful woman in her mid-20s from a rich family who loves "beautiful bones." The two live in the city of Asahikawa in Hokkaido, and they get involved in various incidents regarding bones.
ending_theme: "Uchiyoserareta Bōkyaku no Zankyō ni" (打ち寄せられた忘却の残響に) by TECHNOBOYS PULCRAFT GREEN-FUND
insert_song: "DOKURO~Kōhone Raisan Uta Dai 1-Shō~" (DOKURO ～恍骨礼讃歌 第1章～) by Kiyoshioni MkII
